news.title: Surge in ‘big-money’ divorces even as rate of separation falls
news.summary: There was a significant rise in big-money divorce applications last year, bucking the prevailing trend for divorces, which have been decreasing in recent years.

news.title: Wexford family terrified after three petrol bombs were thrown through window as they lay sleeping
news.summary: A woman and her family are in a state of shock after their home in Wexford housing estate was the target of a petrol bomb attack over the weekend, while they lay sleeping in bed in the early hours of Saturday morning.

news.summary: A former RTÉ boss is facing a fresh appeal to appear before the Oireachtas media committee after he was spotted at Joe Duffy’s leaving party last week.

news.title: Designer Sonya Lennon: ‘I was threatened with arrest mid-air. There was a garda van waiting on the apron when we got to Dublin Airport’
news.summary: TV presenter, designer and entrepreneur Sonya Lennon is from Co Dublin. A co-founder of homewares brand Lennon Courtney, she is also the founder of WorkEqual, which aims to raise awareness of gender inequality in the workplace. Lennon lives in Dublin with her partner David and their twins, Evie and Finn.

news.title: Netanyahu says meeting with Trump focused on efforts to free hostages
news.summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said on Wednesday his meeting with U.S. President Donald Trump focused on efforts to free hostages held in Gaza, and stressed his determination to "eliminate" the military and governmental capabilities of Hamas.

news.title: Cian Tracey: How Ireland solved scrum problems in-game against Georgia
news.summary: One of the most important aspects of top-level coaching is identifying flaws during the white heat of a game, and then being able to adapt accordingly.

news.title: Delays in cancer tests and treatment causing ‘avoidable deaths’, damning report claims
